title: Glazed Ham
steps: Place ham cut-side down in roasting pan.
Cover tightly with foil. Bake at 250°F until 100°F internal, about 1.5-2 hours.
Brush with half the glaze. Bake 15 minutes.
Brush with remaining glaze. Bake until 120°F and caramelized, 15-20 minutes.
notes: Spiral ham is already cooked - just heating and glazing.
